department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Request for Information (RFI) regarding Parliamentary and Conference interpretation in both official languages. As part of the development of a Request for Proposals (RFP) for conference and parliamentary interpretation services in official languages for the Translation Bureau. The RFI is simply intended to solicit feedback from industry with respect to the matters described.

I removed all the words which were irrelevant.

### Expression of Interest

**Procurement Method Bidding Process:** Competitive
**Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)

The Translation Bureau in Public Services and Procurement Canada are issuing this Request for Information (RFI) for Conference and Parliamentary Interpretation Services in both official languages for the Translation Bureau. This RFI aims to gather information from interested parties on the following topics:

* Draft Statement of Work
* Evaluation Procedures
* Basis of Payment
* Mandatory Technical Criteria
* other related clauses
* Indigenous Procurement
* Questions to Industry
* Industry Interest and Readiness
* Understanding the impacts that this purchase may have on industry.

### Background Information

This RFI is not a bid solicitation, and it will not result in the award of any contract. Suppliers are not required to reserve stock or facilities, nor allocate resources, based on this request for information. Suppliers who submit information will not be precluded from
